info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 10:21PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...LOW VISIBILITY POSSIBLE AGAIN TONIGHT ALONG I-40 IN PIGEON RIVER GORGE IN NORTHERN HAYWOOD COUNTY... A Wildfire burning in Haywood County on the north side of Interstate 40 between mile marker 3 and mile marker 5...in the area of the tunnel near Buzzards Roost...is expected to create smoke that may fill up part of the Pigeon River Gorge overnight. Travelers may encounter sharply reduced visibility along Interstate 40 generally between the Harmon Den exit...mile marker 7...and the Tennessee state line. Be on the lookout for slow or stopped traffic in poor visibility due to the smoke, particularly around the tunnel west of the Harmon Den exit. Consider postponing your trip if you can, or take an alternate route to avoid the area near the fire along Interstate 40.
